title: ex-Challenger ADC LFT
body:
Hey guys, just looking for a team to play with and help improve as the new season hits. I peaked at challenger last season but unfortunately stopped playing for several months and decayed to Plat 1 and am now currently sitting in D4. I am mostly going to put most my spare time into grinding solo q again and trying to get back to where I was but would like to also have a team to play with to kind of tweak my overall performance in games. I am very easy going, open to constructive criticism and can make you untilt from our losses with my positive attitude! 

But seriously, wish you all the best of luck in your Season 8 grind. Hope to hear back from someone.

Peace

- Jason

IGN: J S F A K

replies.body:
Hi Jason, I'm currently looking to create a new high-elo competitive team in OCE:

[https://www.reddit.com/r/TeamRedditTeams/comments/7t9eeu/oced4starting_a_competitive_team/?](https://www.reddit.com/r/TeamRedditTeams/comments/7t9eeu/oced4starting_a_competitive_team/)

You are saying everything I want to hear, and I look forward to hearing some more.
Pogchamp. Can I add you? im just a gold scrub ill try to climb this season aswell {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
